description: Invest in the transition to a zero-carbon economy through the VanEck S&P Global Mining UCITS ETF. Demand from developing economies is rising just as the need from sustainable technologies such as wind turbines and solar cells is accelerating. Yet after years of restructuring supply appears tight. This ETF is a simple and effective way to invest in this powerful theme through a broad portfolio of mining companies.
name: VanEck S&P Global Mining UCITS ETF
